author: makortel
body:
This PR backports the esential parts of the following PRs to SLHC branch to allow more detailed vertex performance studies
- #4872
- #5087
- #7756
- #8009 
- #8412

Tested in CMSSW_6_2_0_SLHC25_patch3. Some changes to existing vertex plots are expected due to changes in binning.

@rovere @VinInn
title: Backport vertex validation developments from 75X to SLHC
